name: Vegan Curry Quinoa Salad
author: A Korean
summary: The original recipe was a non-vegan version I found at another food website. I've made some major overhauls to the original recipe, I feel that I can call it my own. I took the dish to a recent vegan potluck dinner and it was a huge hit!  Lots of flavor. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: 6 ounces vegan sour cream (such as Tofutti®)
2 teaspoons finely grated peeled fresh ginger
1 (1 pound) firm-ripe mango, cut into 1/2-inch chunks
directions: Combine water and quinoa in a saucepan over high heat
Cover and bring to a boil
Cook until water has been absorbed, about 15 minutes
Whisk sour cream, curry powder, lime juice, ginger, salt, and black pepper together in a large bowl
Toss with the quinoa, mango, peanuts, red bell pepper, mint, and jalapeno
